TopicTitle: F***ing FXModuleLookAtConstraint, how do they work? (Solved)

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I'm trying to make a wheel with working suspension linkages like the stock rover wheels. The wheels are working fine and I can drive around and stuff, but there does not appear to be any documentation on how to get the linkages working using the fxmodule.

I mean I have the linkages named susp1-1 susp1-2 and set up the module in the CFG, just like the suspension traverse, is there anything more I need to do? It's definitely doing something because if I include the module my linkages start to point the wrong way...

Surely someone knows how this works?

Edited June 8, 2013 by zitronen
can you link to whatever information you already have?
Well everything I know about wheels is in this picture: http://i.imgur.com/XHZoV2G.png
OK I figured it out. The suspension parts must have their Z axis as the "front" in unity.
